category.catalyst_description: Add or remove a node to the decentralized network of community-run content servers

category.catalyst_remove_description: Remove a node from the network of community-run servers

category.remove_poi_description: Maybe a given location wasn’t noteworthy enough. We dare you to try to put it down.
category.ban_name_description: Ban an offensive name from Decentraland
category.grant_description: Request funding from the DAO for a project or contribution
category.grant_paused: The Decentraland DAO Grants Program has been put on hold by community decision until February 28th, 2023. Please read [this governance proposal](https://governance.decentraland.org/proposal/?id=9f3b0be0-7e94-11ed-8750-cd1748a98b11) to learn more or visit the [DAO Discord Server](https://dcl.gg/dao-discord) to engage with members of the community.
category.hiring_description: Request a Community member to be added or removed from a Committee
category.hiring_add_description: Promote a noteworthy Decentraland citizen to be hired by the DAO
category.hiring_add_paused: There are no open seats in any of the DAO Committees
category.hiring_remove_description: Suggest to demote a specific DAO member from their Committee duties
category.poll_description: Ask community members for their opinion on an issue or topic
category.draft_description: Present a potential policy to the community in a structured format and to formalize discussion
category.governance_description: Formalize the passed version of a Draft into a binding governance outcome
category.linked_wearables_description: Request to be admitted as an approved partner to create wearables as representations of your NFTs in Decentraland
category.pitch_description: Validate ideas to spawn new projects
category.bid_description: Choose a team to execute a project that solves a previously passed Tender

vp_delegation.title: Voting Power Delegation
vp_delegation.description: Choose who you’d like to receive the 100% of your **{vp} Voting Power**. You may delegate your VP to any user, but we’d like you to consider picking one of the following individuals who have applied to become Delegates.
vp_delegation.description_generic: Sign in to choose who you'd like to receive your VP. You may delegate it to any user, but we'd like you to consider picking one of the following individuals who have applied to become Delegates.
vp_delegation.delegated_globally_helper: Click to edit this delegation on Snapshot
vp_delegation.error_helper: An error occurred, please try again later

details.stats_match_helper: This indicator displays the percentage of proposals where you and this Delegate voted choosing the same outcome
details.stats_bar_mana_info: **MANA Voting Power** comes from holding Decentraland's token MANA. 1 MANA = 1 VP
details.stats_bar_land_info: **LAND Voting Power** comes from owning Decentraland's LAND (NFT), not contained in an ESTATE. 1 LAND = 2,000 VP
details.stats_bar_name_info: **NAMES Voting Power** comes from owning Decentraland's NAME (NFT). 1 NAME = 100 VP
details.stats_bar_delegated_info: Anybody in Decentraland may delegate VP to any other account. Delegated VP is taken into consideration when voting only when the Delegator hasn't casted a vote on the same proposal.
details.stats_bar_estates_info: **ESTATES Voting Power** comes from owning Decentraland's ESTATE. VP for ESTATEs is calculated by multiplying the number on LANDs in an ESTATE * 2,000
details.stats_bar_l1_wearables_info: **L1 Wearables** from selected collections accounts for VP based on their level of rarity.
details.stats_bar_rental_info: **LAND Rental Voting Power** comes from owning Decentraland's LAND or ESTATES (NFT), currently being rented. 1 LAND rented = 2,000 VP / 1 ESTATE rented = LANDs in an ESTATE * 2,000

proposal_success.title: Proposal successfully submitted
proposal_success.description: Thanks for taking part in the DAO

proposal_pending.tender_description: Your proposal is now published. When the Tender submission period ends, it will be open for voting.

proposal_pending.helper: Set a reminder in your Calendar for when the voting period begins.
proposal_pending.bid_description: Your bid has been successfully submitted and stored. It will remain private until the voting period starts. It will only be published for voting if at least one competing bid for the same Tender exists.

proposal_pending.bid_calendar_details: If the Tender proposal received more than 1 bid, the voting period is starting today. The voting period will remain open for 30 days. Use this link to check the status and share the proposal: {url}

identity_setup.description: By linking your Decentraland profile to your other social accounts you will be able to enhance your governance experience and never miss a beat of what’s going on in the DAO.
identity_setup.timer: Time sensitive task. {time} left to complete

forum.card_description: Publish comments on proposals using your Decentraland profile.
forum.title: Decentraland Forum Account
forum.description_step_1: Use your web3 wallet to securely sign a message to start the linking process.
forum.description_step_2: You'll be using the same content as the signature for the next step.
forum.description_step_3: Paste the content onto the comment box and publish to complete the linking.
forum.helper_step_3: Finally, comment on the signed message on the forum thread.

card_helper.step_1_start: Your web3 wallet will trigger a signing request
card_helper.step_2_success: Content copied. Click to copy again

forum.success_text:
**Decentraland and Forum accounts linked successfully** 🎉

Now the comments you left on Proposals will link to your Decentraland profile. Happy governance!
forum.success_subtext: Plus, you'll get a fancy icon next to your **username**
forum.error_text:
**Governance and Forum accounts could not be linked**

Something happened. It must have been aliens or a malevolent AI but we can't be sure.
forum.error_subtext: Maybe just have a go at it one more time?

discord.card_description: Receive real-time notifications customized to your activity and never miss any important events.
discord.title: Discord Account
discord.subtitle: Follow these steps to link your account to your wallet and start getting notifications in Discord.
discord.description_step_1: Use your web3 wallet to securely sign a message to start the linking process.
discord.description_step_2: You'll be using the same content as the signature for the next step.
discord.description_step_3: Paste the content onto the designated channel to complete the linking.
discord.helper_step_3: Finally, send the signed message on the designated channel.

card_helper.step_1_start: Your web3 wallet will trigger a signing request
card_helper.step_2_success: Content copied. Click to copy again

discord.success_text:
**Discord and Governance accounts linked successfully 🎉**

You'll start getting notified via Discord DM when there's new activity in proposals relevant to you.
discord.error_text:
**Discord Account linking failed**

Something happened. It must have been aliens or a malevolent AI but we can't be sure.
discord.error_subtext: Maybe have a go at it one more time?

push.card_description: Receive notifications in your wallet or on any platform using this native web3 messaging protocol.
push.success_subtext: Now you will receive Governance-related notifications in your Push account.

link_discord.title: Receive DAO Notifications in Discord!
link_discord.description:
Connect your Decentraland and Discord in one click! 

By linking your accounts, you can receive real-time, governance-related notifications directly in your Discord inbox.
link_discord.sub: Stay in the loop and never miss out on important updates and opportunities to participate.

priority_proposals.title: Priority Proposals Spotlight
priority_proposals.info: This section highlights binding Governance and project-related proposals that need your attention.

404.title: Not found
404.description: You just hit a route that doesn't exist...

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: A tab where anything is possible

snapshot_status.label: **Snapshot is unstable.** Voting and creating proposals may be unavailable.

home.title: Decentraland DAO
home.description: The governance hub for Decentraland. Create and vote on proposals that help shape the future of the metaverse.

main_banner.title: Get involved and shape Decentraland’s future.
main_banner.description: The  DAO is a key component of the ecosystem and it is the consensus mechanism for defining the rules of the Decentraland's virtual world. Participate in the DAO and make your voice heard.

open_proposals.title: Open Proposals
open_proposals.description: Proposals are created by the community and work as the consensus mechanism used to outline policies and changes to the Decentraland ecosystem. Learn more about them [here](https://docs.decentraland.org/decentraland/what-can-you-do-with-the-dao/).

priority_spotlight.title: Priority Proposals Spotlight
priority_spotlight.description: Your vote matters. This section highlights binding Governance and project-related proposals that need your attention now.

active_community_grants.title: Active Community Grants
active_community_grants.description: Grants are the mechanism that the DAO uses to fund community projects that add value to the Decentraland ecosystem with our Treasury. Read more about grants [here](https://docs.decentraland.org/decentraland/community-grants/).

bottom_banner.title: We have so much ahead of us. The future of the Metaverse is in your hands!

community_engagement.title: Community Engagement
community_engagement.description: See the participation signal from the community and understand the basic health stats from the DAO.

dao_delegates.title: DAO Delegates
dao_delegates.description: Voting Power (VP) delegation is crucial to maximize the circulating VP usage, by assigning your VP to recognized community members who can engage in the governance process on behalf of you.

activity_ticker.title: Latest activity
activity_ticker.update_created: **{author}** published an Update on the Project **{title}**

bid.header: Should funds from the DAO Treasury be allocated to finance a new community-led project addressing issues outlined herein?

grant.header: Should the following **{value}** grant in the **{category}** category be approved?

proposal_bidding_tendering.get_involved_question: Should the problem/opportunity outlined be refined and taken to the next level?
proposal_bidding_tendering.title: About the bidding and tendering process
proposal_bidding_tendering.pitch_proposal_description: Relevant topics may spawn initiatives eligible for being funded by the DAO
proposal_bidding_tendering.tender_proposal_description: Refine into a clearer scope so that teams may propose specific projects
proposal_bidding_tendering.open_for_bids_description: Teams submit projects they think would match the Tender
proposal_bidding_tendering.project_assignation_description: Funding allocated to the proposal accumulating the most VP

proposal_governance_process.title: About the governance process
proposal_governance_process.poll_description: Gather community input on important matters through a non-binding proposal to kickstart the Governance process.
proposal_governance_process.draft_description: Present a potential policy to the community in a structured format and formalize the discussion about the proposal’s potential impacts and implementation pathways.
proposal_governance_process.governance_description: Finalize the decision-making process in a binding proposal by submitting a comprehensive proposal with all relevant details for implementation.

proposal_list.description: The governance hub for Decentraland. Create and vote on proposals that help shape the future of the metaverse.

coauthor_detail.pending_description: You’ve been added as a co-author for this initiative by its creator.

coauthor_detail.accepted_description: You've accepted being involved in this initiative.
coauthor_detail.rejected_description: You've rejected being involved in this initiative.

proposal_detail.description: The governance hub for Decentraland. Create and vote on proposals that help shape the future of the metaverse.
proposal_detail.all_delegators_voted: All your delegators voted by themselves
proposal_detail.user_voted_for_delegators: You voted on behalf of **{amountRepresented} {amountRepresented, plural, one {account} other {accounts}}**

proposal_detail.get_involved_tender: Should funds from the DAO Treasury be allocated to finance a new community-led project addressing issues outlined herein?
proposal_detail.vp_needed: You need at least {vp} to vote

info.user_has_not_voted_delegate_voted_some_d: {delegate} has voted using your delegated {own_vp}. {delegators_that_voted}/{total_delegators} of your party has voted. If you vote for the remaining {delegators_without_vote, plural, one {account who has} other {{delegators_without_vote} accounts who have}} chosen you as their Delegate you will also reclaim your delegated VP.
info.user_has_not_voted_delegate_voted_all_de: {delegate} has voted using your delegated {own_vp}. All of your party has voted.
info.user_has_not_voted_delegate_voted_delega: {delegate} has voted using your delegated {own_vp}, and {total_delegators, plural, one {one account has} other {{total_delegators} accounts have}} delegated {delegated_vp} in total to you. By voting you may overrule your Delegate's vote.
info.user_has_not_voted_delegate_voted_withou: {delegate} voted including your delegated {own_vp}. Know that if you don't share their opinion, you may always overrule the vote.
info.user_has_not_voted_delegate_has_not_vote: You have delegated your own {own_vp} to {delegate}, and {total_delegators, plural, one {one account has} other {{total_delegators} accounts have}} delegated {delegated_vp} in total to you.
{delegate} is your Delegate and as such may vote on your behalf.

Your vote will include the VP you delegated to {delegate}{delegators_without_vote, plural, =0{} one{ and the VP accumulated by the one account in your party that still hasn't voted} other{ and the VP accumulated by the {delegators_without_vote} accounts in your party that still haven't voted}}.
info.user_has_not_voted_no_delegate_some_dele: {delegators_without_vote, plural, =0{Your vote won't include VP delegated to you because all the accounts in your party have already voted} one{Your vote will include the VP delegated by the only account in your party that still hasn't voted} other{Your vote will include the VP delegated by the other {delegators_without_vote} accounts in your party that still haven't voted}}.
info.user_has_not_voted_no_delegate_all_deleg: Your vote will include all VP accumulated by those who have chosen you as their Delegate unless they choose to vote by themselves.
info.user_voted_delegate_voted_the_same_witho: Your Delegate, {delegate}, has voted the same as you. If they were to change their vote, it won't include your VP.
info.user_voted_delegate_voted_differently_wi: Your Delegate, {delegate}, voted on this initiative. Your votes have differed {vote_difference} {vote_difference, plural, one {time} other {times}} so far on finished proposals.
info.user_voted_delegate_voted_the_same_with_: {total_delegators, plural, one{You have voted representing one account that has chosen you as their Delegate} other{You have voted representing {delegators_without_vote}/{total_delegators} accounts that have chosen you as their Delegate}}. Your Delegate, {delegate}, shares your stance.
info.user_voted_delegate_voted_differently_wi: {total_delegators, plural, one{You have voted representing one account that has chosen you as their Delegate} other{You have voted representing {delegators_without_vote}/{total_delegators} accounts that have chosen you as their Delegate}}. Your Delegate, {delegate}, voted differently. Your votes have differed {vote_difference} {vote_difference, plural, one {time} other {times}} so far on finished proposals.
info.user_voted_delegate_has_not_voted_some_d: {total_delegators, plural, one{You have voted representing one account that has chosen you as their Delegate} other{You have voted representing {delegators_without_vote}/{total_delegators} accounts that have chosen you as their Delegate}} with their {delegated_vp}. If your own Delegate, {delegate} were to vote, it wouldn't include your VP.
info.user_voted_delegate_has_not_voted_all_de: Your delegators' accumulated VP was not included in your vote. If your own Delegate, {delegate} were to vote, it wouldn't include your VP.
info.user_voted_delegate_has_not_voted_delega: You have voted representing {total_delegators, plural, one {one account that has} other {{total_delegators} accounts that have}} chosen you as their Delegate. If your own Delegate, {delegate} were to vote, it wouldn't include your VP.
info.user_voted_delegate_has_not_voted_withou: If your Delegate, {delegate} were to vote, it wouldn't include your VP.
info.user_voted_no_delegate_some_delegators_v: Take into consideration that the accounts you represent may choose to vote by themselves at any time
info.user_voted_no_delegate_delegators_have_n: Take into consideration that the accounts you represent may choose to vote by themselves at any time.

description.in_world_content: Seeking funding for the development of experiences to improve user retention
description.accelerator: Private companies or external for-profit initiatives in need of funding
description.core_unit: Seeking funding to provide core infrastructure and operations for the DAO
description.documentation: Seeking funding to create free educational content related to DCL
description.platform: Seeking funding to create tools and applications extending our ecosystem
description.social_media_content: Seeking funding for marketing to improve user adoption and retention
description.sponsorship: Seeking funding to support IRL initiatives for audiences relevant to DCL

competing_proposals.show_sidebar_label: This proposal is competing with {amount} {amount, plural, one {other} other {others}} for funds

grant.update_empty: This team has not posted any updates yet.
grant.update_description: Take notes as you make progress on your project and use them to write your updates to the community.
grant.current_update_info: You must share a community update once every 30 days during your Grant period. Updates can be posted on the last 15 days of every 30-days period.

pending_update_modal.title: Previous Update Pending
pending_update_modal.description: Your last month's project update for the Grant is still pending. To maintain a consistent record, we recommend publishing the previous update before proceeding with this month's update. Please note, that if the pending update is not published, it will be labeled as 'Missed' and cannot be submitted later.
pending_update_modal.description_last: Your last month's project update for the Grant is still pending. This is the last required update for your Grant. We recommend publishing the previous mandatory update before creating additional updates. Please note, that if the pending update is not published, it will be labeled as 'Missed' and cannot be submitted later.

grant.vesting_description: **Funded by the Decentraland DAO**, enabled by its Community.

accelerator.investment_recovery_plan_label: Return of Investment to the DAO Treasury

grants.title: Decentraland DAO Community Grants
grants.description: Check the projects funded by the Decentraland DAO Grants program. Browse them to see their goals, progress, and how they are making an impact in our community.

request_banner.title: Get funded

banner.title: Initiatives making the Decentraland Ecosystem grow

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To support and facilitate the continual growth of the Decentraland platform.
mission.budget_helper: The Decentraland DAO operates a community development Grants Program to support builders, artists, and hackers who enrich the open metaverse through various contributions. The DAO has decided to allocate up to 70% of the MANA received quarterly through its vesting contract, to fund this program.
mission.vesting_helper: The main source of financial support for the Decentraland DAO is a 10-year vesting contract worth 222,000,000 MANA tokens vested continuously that started on February 19, 2020.

submit.title: Submit Proposal
submit.description: Select a proposal category to get started
submit.markdown_notice: You can format your proposal using markdown! Toggle the preview switch to see how your post will be displayed.
submit.co_author_description: If you co-authored this proposal with someone else, you can add their wallet addresses to acknowledge their work. After you publish the proposal, co-authors will be asked to confirm or reject the request. Only if they confirm, they will be listed publicly on the proposal page.
submit.co_author_as_author_error: This wallet address cannot be added since it belongs to the proposal's author.
submit.error_label: There was an error while trying to create the proposal, please try again later.

submit_poll.title: Create a community poll
submit_poll.description:
The purpose of the Poll is to introduce a governance issue to the community, gauge community sentiment, and determine if there is enough support to move forward with the drafting of an initial proposal. Polls can only pass to the Draft stage if they have accumulated a threshold of at least 500K VP

This action requires at least 100 VP. [Buy MANA](https://account.decentraland.org/) to get VP, or [run for delegate](https://forum.decentraland.org/t/open-call-for-delegates-apply-now/5840/5).
submit_poll.title_detail: The question you would like to ask the community.
submit_poll.description_detail: A brief description of your question. Feel free to explain your motivation for polling the community, elaborate on the optional responses, or link to any relevant resources that might help inform voters.
submit_poll.description_placeholder: A brief description of your question.
submit_poll.mandatory_option: This option is mandatory, and can't be removed

submit_draft.title: Draft proposal
submit_draft.description:
The purpose of the Draft Proposal is to present a potential policy to the community in a structured format and to formalize discussion about a proposal’s potential impacts and implementation pathways. Draft Proposals must be structured in a particular form (see Annex 1), and can only pass to the binding Governance Proposal stage with a simple majority (51%) of participating voting power with a threshold of at least 1M VP. A Draft Proposal that fails or does not reach this threshold can be amended and resubmitted one time.

**This action requires at least 1000 VP.** [Buy MANA](https://account.decentraland.org/) to get VP, or [run for delegate](https://forum.decentraland.org/t/open-call-for-delegates-apply-now/5840/5).
submit_draft.title_placeholder: Enter a descriptive title for your proposal here
submit_draft.abstract_detail: Two to three sentence overview of the proposal, specifying its motivation and outcomes.
submit_draft.motivation_detail: Detailed description of the reason why the proposal is necessary/relevant, i.e. what is the problem?
submit_draft.specification_detail: Detailed description of the proposed policy
submit_draft.conclusion_detail: Closing statement encompassing the motivation or problem, proposed solution, and its intended impact/outcome.

submit_governance.title: Governance proposal
submit_governance.description:
The purpose of the Governance Proposal is to formalize the passed version of a Draft into a binding governance outcome. Only established or recognized community members can submit Governance Proposals, which are only passed if they reach the needed acceptance criteria for their category. In the interim period before new voting categories have been established (and for proposals that do not have a pre-set category) a Governance Proposal must receive a simple majority (51%) of participating voting power and at least 6M VP to pass as a binding decision.

Processes and thresholds for established categories will not be changed as part of this proposal. Meaning, the process for grants, POIs, etc… will remain unchanged. Additional categories for specific types of issues, e,g, “fee structures,” will be proposed, and relevant processes and thresholds developed.

**This action requires at least 2500 VP.** [Buy MANA](https://account.decentraland.org/) to get VP, or [run for delegate](https://forum.decentraland.org/t/open-call-for-delegates-apply-now/5840/5).
submit_governance.title_placeholder: Enter a descriptive title for your proposal here
submit_governance.abstract_detail: Two to three sentence overview of the proposal, specifying its motivation and outcomes.
submit_governance.motivation_detail: Detailed description of the reason why the proposal is necessary/relevant, i.e. what is the problem?
submit_governance.specification_detail: Detailed description of the proposed policy
submit_governance.impacts_detail: Detailed assessment of potential impacts, citing your methods, data sources (if relevant), or line of reasoning used in your assessment. This could include, for example, a scenarios assessment outlining preferred (e.g. best case scenario), possible, and undesirable (what could go wrong with the policy, e.g. worst-case scenario) outcomes.
submit_governance.implementation_pathways_detail: Detailed description of concrete steps that can be taken to implement the proposal. This section should demonstrate consultation and communication with community members, and take into consideration DAO Committee feedback on overall technical feasibility and/or constraints.
submit_governance.conclusion_detail: Closing statement encompassing the motivation or problem, proposed solution, and its intended impact/outcome.

submit_ban_name.title: Ban a name
submit_ban_name.description: Banning a name prevents the use of abusive or offensive names for avatars and scenes.
submit_ban_name.name_label: The name you want to ban
submit_ban_name.description_detail: Provide a brief explanation of why this name should be banned. For example: why or to whom might it be offensive?

add.title: Add a Point of Interest
add.coordinates_label: What location do you want to add as a POI?
add.description_detail: Why do you think that this location should be a featured point of interest within Decentraland? Please describe the scene located at these coordinates, explaining how it would be interesting or helpful for other Decentraland users.
add.description_placeholder: The scene located at 0,0 is both visually stunning and informative for new users. The interactive tutorial hosted here would provide people with a fun and enjoyable way to learn more about Decentraland.

remove.title: Remove a Point of Interest
remove.coordinates_label: What location do you want to remove as a POI?
remove.description_detail: Why do you think that this location should be removed as a featured point of interest within Decentraland? Please describe the scene located at these coordinates, explaining why it is no longer an interesting or helpful place for other Decentraland users.
remove.description_placeholder: The scene located at 0,0 is no longer visually stunning for users. The location has been abandoned for a long time.

submit_poi.description: Points of interest (POIs) are scenes that have been highlighted on Decentraland’s map in a ‘pin drop’ form, helping other users to quickly find and access especially interesting areas.
submit_poi.coordinates_detail: Enter the X and Y coordinates of the location.

add.title: Add Committee Member
add.description: Being part of a Committee is great responsibility inside the DAO. Check with whom you are proposing that they agree to be postulated before creating this proposal.
add.address_description: Please copy the address of the proposed member. Check with them which address should you provide
add.reasons_description: Explain why you think this person should be added to the Committee. Have in mind the goal of the Committee and how this person aligns with it. Be as descriptive and objective as possible
add.evidence_description: Be as objective and detailed as possible. List their qualifications and achievements. Provide only publicly available information

remove.title: Remove Committee Member
remove.description: Use this type of Proposal wisely. Before going through this way, talk with the person first, present your case at the Town Halls, and use public communication channels to discuss it. Only after then, publish this proposal.
remove.reasons_description: Explain why this person should be removed from the Committee. Be kind, descriptive, and objective as possible.
remove.evidence_description: Be as objective and detailed as possible. Provide only publicly available information.

catalyst_add.title: Add a catalyst node
catalyst_add.description: Instead of using central servers, Decentraland is run on a network of community-operated nodes. These nodes store copies of all scenes deployed to Decentraland, and they handle the messaging and interactions by establishing peer-to-peer connections between users.
catalyst_add.description_2: To propose the addition of a new node, please provide the following details.
catalyst_add.description_detail: Explain why this node should be added to the Catalyst network. Why would this addition be beneficial to the network? For example, adding nodes in new geographic areas helps to provide a better experience to more users.

catalyst_remove.title: Remove a catalyst node
catalyst_remove.description: Instead of using central servers, Decentraland is run on a network of community-operated nodes. These nodes store copies of all scenes deployed to Decentraland, and they handle the messaging and interactions by establishing peer-to-peer connections between users.
catalyst_remove.description_2: To propose the removal of a node, please provide the following details.
catalyst_remove.description_detail: Explain why this node should be removed from the Catalyst network. Please, be as descriptive and objective as possible.

submit_catalyst.owner_label: Ethereum address of the owner of the Catalyst Node

submit_grant.title: Request a Grant
submit_grant.description:
The Decentraland Grants program allocates MANA owned by the DAO to fund the creation of features or content beneficial to the Decentraland platform and its growth. Either individuals or teams may request grant funding through the DAO. Check the Decentraland’s [Content Policy](https://decentraland.org/content)) to make sure your project is covered.

For your convenience and in preparation for your Grant Request you can download a file with all the questions present in this form [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PSkV756XOUuAPPFlSu0LgqVy0QZ-DueeDj7MwSGRphc/edit#heading=h.xnwultcdr0as).

This action requires at least {threshold} VP. [Buy MANA](https://account.decentraland.org/) to get VP, or [run for delegate](https://forum.decentraland.org/t/open-call-for-delegates-apply-now/5840/5).

category_selection.description: Choose a category that best suits your project
category_selection.suspended_description: The budget allocation for the following Grant categories has been suspended for the time being as a result of a binding community decision on [this proposal](https://decentraland.org/governance/proposal/?id=a89f79f1-7171-4982-8ca1-5a21b5872373)
category_selection.documentation: Not sure which one to choose? Find out more about our Categories on our [Grants Documentation](https://docs.decentraland.org/player/general/dao/overview/grants-program/#grant-categories-and-requirements)

funding_section.title: Funding
funding_section.category_budget_info: The DAO allocates a portion of its monthly budget to the Grants program. Each Category has allocated a percentage of the total available funds for the program. If your ask is bigger than the remaining budget for the selected category, you won't be able to request it and will have to wait until the next quarter.
funding_section.pass_threshold_sub: Accumulated VP needed for this proposal to pass
funding_section.payout_strategy_sub: Executed 7 days after the proposal has passed
funding_section.calculation_helper: Calculation is automated based on the Grants Rules
funding_section.funding_time_title: What time of the month would you like for the funding to happen?
funding_section.preferred_payment_token: What is your preferred payment token?

general_info.title: General Information
general_info.title_detail: Provide a title that is concise and descriptive for your grant request. This title will appear as the header of your proposal’s detail page on the Governance dApp, our Snapshot space, and the Forum thread of your Proposal.
general_info.title_placeholder: Enter a descriptive title for your grant proposal here.
general_info.description:
Decentraland Grants allow the DAO’s MANA to fund the creation of features or content for the Decentraland platform. Either individuals or teams may apply within one of five categories, and there are six levels of funding for each category. Before submitting your grant proposal, please review the [Grants Framework](https://docs.decentraland.org/decentraland/community-grants/) here.

Aside from the requirements listed in the Grants Framework and Decentraland’s [Content Policy](https://decentraland.org/content), [Terms of Use](https://decentraland.org/terms), and [Code of Ethics](https://decentraland.org/ethics), there are no constraints on the content or features that may be funded.
general_info.description_detail: Allows you to elaborate on why your project should receive funding, the problems that your project will solve, or the benefits it will bring to the Decentraland platform.
general_info.abstract_detail: Please explain the key components of your project. This should include a description of the feature or content you want to create, what needs or goals your work may satisfy, and the skills or experience you have that will contribute to your success. This is your chance to make a good first impression on the community.
general_info.abstract_placeholder: Enter a quick, non-technical overview of your project here.
general_info.beneficiary_detail: The address that will receive the grant funds. This must be an Ethereum address! Entering a non-Ethereum address that cannot receive MANA may result in a permanent loss of funds.
general_info.roadmap_detail: Describe the roadmap of your project, making sure to include any relevant milestones that the community should be aware of and how you will share the progress you have made. Clearly communicating progress for long-term projects funded by vesting contracts will help prevent the removal of your funding.
general_info.roadmap_placeholder: Your estimated timeline and key milestones. Include your plan for reporting progress to the community.
general_info.email_detail: This email address will be used by the Grant Support teams to contact you to check the progress of the grant, set up meetings, and maintain an open communication channel.
general_info.email_note: Note: The address will be published in the proposal and publicly visible. If you want to keep your anonymity consider using an email address without personally identifiable information.

core_unit.strategic_value_label: How will your team provide strategic value to the Decentraland DAO?

content_type.label: What type of content are you planning to produce?

documentation.total_pieces_label: How many pieces of content are you planning to publish under the duration of this Grant?

in_world_content.total_pieces_label: How many pieces of content (i.e. number of events, scenes, or games) are you planning to produce under the duration of this Grant?
in_world_content.total_users_label: How many users do you expect to engage with this content?
in_world_content.engagement_measurement_label: How are you going to measure the engagement with your content? (I.e. newly populated land, Active Users, Returning Users, Time on Scene)

social_media_platforms.label: Please select the social media platforms where you will publish this content:

social_media_content.audience_relevance_label: Tell us how your audience is relevant to Decentraland.
social_media_content.total_pieces_label: How many pieces of content are you planning to generate?
social_media_content.total_impact_label: How many people do you plan to impact with this content?
social_media_content.relevant_link_label: Please provide links to your current social media channels

sponsorship.primary_source_funding_label: Is this grant the primary source of funding for this event?
sponsorship.total_events_label: How many events are you planning to organize?
sponsorship.total_attendance_label: How many people are you expecting to attend?
sponsorship.audience_relevance_label: How is your audience relevant to Decentraland?
sponsorship.showcase_label: How is the Decentraland brand going to be showcased?

accelerator.revenue_label: Please describe your revenue generation model
accelerator.return_of_investment_label: What’s your plan for returning the investment to the DAO?
accelerator.investment_recovery_label: How many months will it take the DAO to recover the investment made on your project based on your estimations?

due_diligence.title: Due-diligence
due_diligence.budget_breakdown_detail: Please provide a detailed specification on how you will be using the funds requested for this Grant. Our community values transparency, so be as specific as possible. **${value}** left to disclose.

budget_breakdown_modal.title: Breaking the Budget Down
budget_breakdown_modal.duration_subtitle: In how many months will this cost be split

team.title: Team
team.members_detail: Please list who will be working on this project and include an explicit overview of their relevant skillset and experience. You may provide links to portfolios or profiles to help the Decentraland community get to know who the DAO will be funding and how their backgrounds will contribute to your project’s success.

final_consent.title: Final Consent
final_consent.subtitle: Review and check the following
final_consent.content_policy_label: I’ve read and understood Decentraland’s [Content Policy](https://decentraland.org/content)
final_consent.terms_of_use_label: I’ve read Decentraland’s [Terms of Use](https://decentraland.org/terms) and agree with them
final_consent.code_of_ethics_label: I’ve read Decentraland’s [Code of Ethics](https://decentraland.org/ethics) and hereby commit to honoring it
final_consent.platform_category_license_label: I agree to work and publish the source code and its derivatives produced for this grant under an [Apache 2.0 license](https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)
final_consent.platform_category_documentation_label: I agree to publish documentation for the community to understand and contribute to the codebase
final_consent.documentation_category_label: I agree to publish all the content produced under this Grant with an [Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

submit_grant.accelerator_description: A private company or for-profit initiative in need of funding
submit_grant.core_unit_description: Provide core infrastructure and operations for the DAO
submit_grant.documentation_description: Creation of free educational content related to Decentraland’s dynamics

submit_grant.social_media_content_description: Marketing efforts aiming to reach new users and keeping them engaged
submit_grant.sponsorship_description: Supporting IRL initiatives targeting audiences relevant to Decentraland
submit_grant.size_detail: Please enter the exact amount of funding you would like to request. This amount must be within the range of your selected tier.

submit_linked_wearables.title: Linked Wearables Registry
submit_linked_wearables.description:
Linked Wearables are a way to represent NFTs as Wearables in Decentraland. Third parties need to submit a proposal to be approved by the DAO in order to access the tool in the [Builder](https://builder.decentraland.org/) and get slots to submit the 3D models. By using this tool, you will be able to submit [NFTs as Wearables](https://governance.decentraland.org/proposal/?id=14e76cc0-2bc7-11ec-ac84-77607720a240) to be curated and made available for your NFT holders inside Decentraland.

Note that after being approved, you will need to create an API with the endpoints described in this [Document](https://github.com/decentraland/adr/blob/main/docs/ADR-42-third-party-assets-integration.md#third-party-resolver).
submit_linked_wearables.name_detail: Please enter the name that represents your Project, Company, or Community as a whole
submit_linked_wearables.links_detail: Links for your project website, Discord server, social media, or any other relevant space for your Project
submit_linked_wearables.nft_collections_detail: Describe the NFT Collections you created. If it’s only one, just describe that one
submit_linked_wearables.nft_collections_placeholder: Describe the NFT Collections you created here
submit_linked_wearables.items_detail: How many 3D models (Linked Wearables) will be uploaded. Note: This is not the number of NFTs in the original collection.
submit_linked_wearables.items_placeholder: Add the number of items you will upload
submit_linked_wearables.smart_contract_detail: Share the Addresses of the smart contracts of your NFT collections
submit_linked_wearables.governance_detail: Provide proof that you are the rightful owner or representative of the Project, Company, or Community. Please share any links with relevant information.
submit_linked_wearables.motivation_detail: Why do you want to have your NFTs represented in Decentraland?
submit_linked_wearables.managers_detail: Addresses of the representatives that will Manage the tool. Note: Managers are the only ones allowed to add item representations and manage the tool
submit_linked_wearables.programmatically_generated_description: The collection you will upload to Decentraland as Linked Wearables is programmatically generated. This means the 3D models you will submit to Decentraland were made this way.
submit_linked_wearables.programmatically_generated_note: In general, large collections of more than 5k NFTs are not created manually, they are systematically generated from individual traits that were designed individually. If your Linked Wearables Collection is made like this, share the details below.
submit_linked_wearables.method_detail: Describe the method used to create the programmatic collection. If possible, share proof and links to the repository.
submit_linked_wearables.image_previews_detail: Provide up to {amount} images to show the community what your collection and wearables looks like. JPG, PNG, BMP & WEBP formats supported.
submit_linked_wearables.marketplace_link_detail: Provide an URL where users can see your NFT collection listed in an NFT marketplace like OpenSea, Rarible, or any other

submit_pitch.title: Pitch proposal
submit_pitch.description:
Pitch proposals are the first step towards validating whether an idea is worth pursuing as a Project Tender and securing funds and bids from external teams to execute it.

This action requires at least 100 VP. [Buy MANA](https://account.decentraland.org/) to get VP, or [run for delegate](https://forum.decentraland.org/t/open-call-for-delegates-apply-now/5840/5).
submit_pitch.initiative_name_postlabel: This is what will be displayed on the Proposals Feed
submit_pitch.problem_statement_detail: Please explain the problem this initiative would solve in using simple words
submit_pitch.proposed_solution_detail: Please explain how you would think this problem should be approached using simple words
submit_pitch.target_audience_detail: Please describe the intended user of the proposed solution: their needs, concerns, motivations, etc.
submit_pitch.relevance_detail: Please explain why the Decentraland DAO should be spending money on this project. Specify market conditions, competitors, new technical developments, and any other relevant factors you consider

submit_tender.title: Tender proposal
submit_tender.description:
Tender proposals are the second step in the Bidding & Tendering process. The aim of this stage is to refine the problems outlined in the Pitch proposal, providing a clearer vision of what the execution teams should propose in their Bid proposals.

This action requires at least {threshold} VP. [Buy MANA](https://account.decentraland.org/) to get VP, or [run for delegate](https://forum.decentraland.org/t/open-call-for-delegates-apply-now/5840/5).
submit_tender.summary_description: Provide a high-level overview of the idea behind this tender and its connection to the original Pitch proposal.
submit_tender.problem_statement_description: Describe the specific problem that this solution aims to solve for the Decentraland community.
submit_tender.technical_specification_description: Outline how the execution team could implement this solution. Please note that this is not binding, and execution teams may propose a new technical pathway in their bid proposals.
submit_tender.use_cases_description: Explain how the target audience will benefit from this project, how they will use it, and the value they will derive from it.
submit_tender.deliverables_description: Detail all the artifacts that the execution teams should deliver as part of this Tender. For example, working software, documentation, marketing plans, social media strategies, etc.
submit_tender.target_release_quarter_description: State the anticipated release date for the community. Please note that this is not binding, and execution teams may propose a new date in their bid proposals.

submit_bid.title: Submit Bid proposal
submit_bid.description: Part of the Bidding & Tendering process, bid proposals are meant for professional teams to scope and propose a project out of their own understanding of one given issue or desire outlined by the Community based on the two preceding instances that would have passed. Only one Bid Proposal per a given Tender Proposal will be funded.

general_info.title: General information
general_info.deliverables_detail: Be as specific as possible. Describe the entire scope of the project and the actual work you are going to deliver to the DAO.
general_info.beneficiary_detail: The address that will receive the grant funds. This must be an Ethereum address! Entering a non-Ethereum address that cannot receive MANA may result in a permanent loss of funds.
general_info.roadmap_detail: Describe the roadmap of your project, making sure to include any relevant milestones that the community should be aware of and how you will share the progress you have made. Clearly communicating progress for long-term projects funded by vesting contracts will help prevent the removal of your funding.
general_info.roadmap_placeholder: Your estimated timeline and key milestones. Include your plan for reporting progress to the community.
general_info.email_detail: This email address will be used by the Grant Support teams to contact you to check the progress of the grant, set up meetings, and maintain an open communication channel.
general_info.email_note: Note: The address will be published in the proposal and publicly visible. If you want to keep your anonymity consider using an email address without personally identifiable information.

proposal_update.title: Publish New Grant Update
proposal_update.description: Share your grant updates with the Decentraland Community. Use this space to talk about the progress but also to raise issues or blockers you might have with your project. Feel free to add any relevant information or links to demo what you’ve been up to.
proposal_update.highlights_placeholder: What have you shipped? Where have you made progress? What are you proud of?
proposal_update.blockers_placeholder: What is being difficult? Why is the project delayed? When sharing a blocker, share the mitigation strategy you’re planning to remove that blocker.
proposal_update.next_steps_placeholder: What are your upcoming tasks? Where is your focus going to be next?
proposal_update.additional_notes_placeholder: Feel free to share any additional information or resources to showcase your project.
proposal_update.reporting_description: Bring some light onto how this project is utilizing funds, CSV syntax. More about our formatting [here](https://dcl-dao.notion.site/Instructions-for-uploading-your-Grant-s-Financial-Report-13c022162e204a5a9a37f18888ff3a69).
proposal_update.csv_invalid_row: Missing fields. Parsed {parsed} out of {expected} fields
proposal_update.summary_description: According to what you've disclosed above, this is what you spent since your last update looks like.
